title: Charlie! (Music from the films of Charlie Chaplin)
description:
Charlie! (Music from the films of Charlie Chaplin)

In addition to being a pioneering motion picture genius, Charlie Chaplin was also a very talented composer. Not only did he produce, write, direct and star in most of his later works, but he was also the composer. In his later years, Chaplin went back and composed scores for his earlier silent feature films. (When released, most silent films were either shown completely silent, or with live accompaniment... often a lone pianist.) Charlie! is a collection of his most memorable compostions.


01 - Eternally  (from ''Limelight'').mp3
02 - Foxtrot  (from ''The Idle Class'').mp3
03 - Mandolin Serenade  (from ''A King in New York'').mp3
04 - Weeping Willows  (from ''A King in New York'').mp3
05 - Peace Patrol.mp3
06 - Love Song  (from ''The Freak'').mp3
07 - Rumba  (from ''Monsieur Verdoux'').mp3
08 - Tango 'Bitterness'  (from ''Monsieur Verdox'').mp3
09 - Cancan 'A Paris Boulevard'  (from ''Monsieur Verdoux'').mp3
10 - Medley (Smile, Charlie's Dance, Toy Waltz, In the City)  (from ''Modern Times'').mp3
11 - There's Always One You Can't Forget.mp3
12 - Napoli March  (from ''The Great Dictator'').mp3
13 - Beautiful Wonderful Eyes  (from ''City Lights'').mp3
14 - This Is My Song  (from ''A Countess from Hong Kong'').mp3
